title: Confessions of a Broken Blade Ch. 1 | LORE VAULT NARRATION

embed.description: Time for a good night story! :) So yesterday the story of Yasuo and Riven started releasing and guess what I got for you guys today? Guess what I got for you guys tomorrow? :D Enjoy Twitter: https://twitter.com/ollimenaughty Story: https://twitter.com/tkittenwritten Music: http://www.purple-planet.com Art: https://magicnaanavi.deviantart.com/ https://knkl.deviantart.com/ "Confessions of a Broken Blade Ch.

body:
Hi there every1 made you something to fall asleep to again! ;P

So yesterday the story of Yasuo and Riven started releasing and guess what I got for you guys today?

Aaaaaand, guess what I got for you guys tomorrow? :D

Enjoy and tell me what you think.

replies.body: Oh, this is really cool. Thanks for making it! Please do more of these.

> [{quoted}](name=LeaoC,realm=NA,application-id=6kFXY1kR,discussion-id=80LqxgbH,comment-id=0000,timestamp=2018-04-26T00:52:01.026+0000)
>
> Oh, this is really cool. Thanks for making it! Please do more of these.

Thank you! This means a lot to me!! :D :D
I definitely will and am currently working on chapter 3, also just released the narration of [chapter 2](https://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/story-art/hPRXjcrY-confessions-of-a-broken-blade-ch-2-lore-vault-narration). :)

Have a nice!
